segments.text: Room service , can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . This is Barbara in room 209 . I ’ d like to order breakfast , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What would you like to order ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Two slices of whole wheat bread and one cup of coffee .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay . I ’ ll have them brought to your room right away .
segments.speaker: S1
